title: Jason Momoa reveals Lisa Bonet had always been his childhood crush
text:
Couple goals right there (Picture: EPA/NINA PROMMER)

Jason Momoa admitted Lisa Bonet had been his childhood crush long before the two even met.

The Aquaman actor must have planned the couple falling in love, getting married, and having kids because who else gets to marry their childhood crush?

He told Esquire magazine: ‘[She was] literally my childhood crush. I mean I didn’t tell her that. I didn’t let her know I was a stalker until after we had the kids.’

It’s a good thing he didn’t, otherwise there would have been a chance of Lisa running for the hills.

Jason married the Cosby Show actress in 2017 and they had been together for 12 years before then.

They share Lola, 12, and Wolf, 10, and are honestly the perfect family.

The Khal Drogo star thinks his marriage to Lisa – who also has daughter Zoe Kravitz with musician Lenny Kravitz – is proof that ‘anything’ can happen, no matter how unlikely the odds.

Has anyone ever seen exes get on with current partners like this? (Picture: Alexandra Wyman/WireImage)

Jason and Lisa have been married for two years (Picture: Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic)

The odds are usually in your favour when you look like, sound like, and are Jason Momoa.

‘If someone says something isn’t possible. I’m like, “Listen here, I married Lisa Bonet. Anything is effing possible.”’

Get you a man that talks about you the way Jason talks about Lisa.

Meanwhile, our Khal will soon be reunited the Khaleesi Emilia Clarke on The Graham Norton Show soon.

On 25 October, the Game Of Thrones pals will be promoting their latest projects while we get to witness a beautiful reunion.

Daenerys Targaryen will finally see her moon and her stars (Picture: HBO)

Jason will star in the futuristic TV series See, while Emilia is already creating a buzz with her festive film Last Christmas.

Emilia is best known for playing Daenerys Targaryen on GoT, the onetime lover of Jason’s character Khal Drogo.

In season one Daenerys and Drogo fell madly in love, but it was cut brutally short when a festering arrow wound caused Drogo to fall into a coma (which we still haven’t gotten over, by the way).

The actors have remained good friends despite only being in one season together, so it will be a treat to see them share a screen once again – as themselves this time.
